src:
Erdoganova cesta bola ohrozená, ale s Trumpom sa vo Washingtone stretne
07 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Webnoviny
7.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Turecký prezident Recep Tayyip Erdogan sa na budúci týždeň stretne s americkým prezidentom Donaldom Trumpom.
Erdoganova kancelária potvrdila, že dvojica sa počas stredajšieho telefonátu dohodla, že schôdzka sa bude konať 13. novembra vo Washingtone. Politik pritom prijal pozvanie šéfa Bieleho domu. Dvojica sa počas telefonátu rozprávala aj o „bilaterálnych otázkach a regionálnom rozvoji“.
Erdoganova plánovaná cesta bola ohrozená po tom, ako americká Snemovňa reprezentantov nedávno odhlasovala drvivou väčšinou uznanie masového vyvražďovania Arménov osmanskými Turkami za genocídu. Toto rozhodnutie Turkov nahnevalo.
Viac k témam: americký prezident, turecký prezidentZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Erdoganova cesta bola ohrozená, ale s Trumpom sa vo Washingtone stretne © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Erdogan's road was compromised, but he would meet Trump in Washington
07 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Webnoviny
President Tayyip Erdogan to meet US President Donald Trump next week
Erdogan's office confirmed that the couple agreed on Wednesday's call that the meeting would be held on November 13 in Washington. The politician accepted the invitation of the White House chief. During the call, the couple also talked about "bilateral issues and regional development".
Erdogan's planned trip was threatened after the US House of Representatives recently voted by an overwhelming majority to recognize the mass murder of Armenians by the Ottoman Turks as genocide. This decision made the Turks angry.
More on Topics: US President, Turkish President Source: Webnoviny.sk - Erdogan's road has been compromised, but he will meet Trump in Washington © SITA All rights reserved.
